description:
### FractionDivision

The FractionDivision function takes two fractions represented as arrays of two elements [numerator, denominator] and returns their division represented as an array of two elements in simplified form.

Input: Two arrays each having two integers - the numerator and denominator of the fractions.
Output: An array representing the simplified form of the division of the two fractions.

Example:

``` fractionDivision([2, 3], [5, 6]) // [4, 5] ```
